EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1P Live Stream 9-24-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Join the SpringOne Platform Live Stream
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[springoneplatform.io]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
It’s here! SpringOne Platform 2018 kicks off tomorrow. Can’t attend in person? Each day, watch all the SpringOne Platform main stage speakers, and tune in for some exciting product announcements from Pivotal via the live stream on springoneplatform.io <[[springoneplatform.io]]>.
Tune In: Tuesday, September 25th from 9:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. EDT Wednesday, September 26th from 9:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. EDT Thursday, September 27th from 9:00 a.m. - 10:00 a.m. EDT
Main Stage Talks from Tech Leaders: Hear SpringOne Platform keynote speakers from Pivotal, Boeing, Microsoft, StubHub, Mastercard, Dick’s Sporting Goods, West Corporation, Confluent, Express Scripts, U.S. Airforce, Facebook, Merrill Corp, Google, Accenture and more!
Product News: Learn about the latest Spring and Pivotal Cloud Foundry product updates, see hot product demos from Spring engineers, and a few announcements you won’t want to miss!
We hope you’ll (virtually) join us for an exciting week of news, talks and more!
The SpringOne Platform Team
